<style>
    /* æ•´ä¸ªç›’å­ */
    .box{
      width: calc(2 * var(--radius));
      height: calc(2 * var(--radius));
      position: relative;
    }
    /* å•ä¸ªå°ç›’å­ */
    .father{
      width: var(--radius);
      height: var(--radius);
      overflow: hidden;
      position: absolute;
      left: 0;
      bottom: 0;
      transform-origin: right top;
    }
    .father:nth-child(2n) {
      color: yellow;
    }
    /* å¼§ */
    .hu{
      width: calc(2 * var(--radius));
      height: var(--radius);
      border-radius: 0 0 var(--radius) var(--radius);
      background-color: currentColor;
      position: absolute;
      left: 0;
      bottom: 0;
      transform-origin: top;
      transform: rotate(120deg);
    }
    .rotate1{
      transform: rotate(-120deg);
    }
    .rotate2{
      transform: rotate(-60deg);
    }
    .rotate3{
      transform: rotate(60deg);
    }
    .rotate4{
      transform: rotate(120deg);
    }
    .rotate5{
      transform: rotate(180deg);
    }
  </style>

<div class="box" style="--radius: 100px">
  <div class="father rotate1">
    <div class="hu"></div>
  </div>
  <div class="father rotate2">
    <div class="hu"></div>
  </div>
  <div class="father">
    <div class="hu"></div>
  </div>
  <div class="father rotate3">
    <div class="hu"></div>
  </div>
  <div class="father rotate4">
    <div class="hu"></div>
  </div>
  <div class="father rotate5">
    <div class="hu"></div>
  </div>
</div>

åˆ†æˆä¸Šä¸‹ä¸¤éƒ¨åˆ†ç»˜åˆ¶ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ä¼ªç±»å…ƒç´ ä»¥å‡å°‘domå…ƒç´

ç”¨position + marginæ–¹å¼å®ç°å…ƒç´ å±…ä¸­ï¼Œçˆ¶å…ƒç´ ä¸ºbody

<div class="nuclear-warn"></div>
<script>
  const {sqrt, pow} = Math;
  // æŠŠç­‰è…°ä¸‰è§’å½¢åˆ†æˆä¸¤ä¸ªç›´è§’ä¸‰è§’å½¢ï¼Œè®¡ç®—å‚ç›´è¾¹é•¿ï¼Œä½œä¸º:before,:afterçš„é«˜åº¦
  const a = 200; // ç­‰è¾¹ä¸‰è§’å½¢å˜é•¿
  const b = a / 2;
  const c = sqrt(pow(a, 2) - pow(b, 2));
  console.log(c); // çº¦ç­‰äº173
</script>
<style>
    /* å±…ä¸­å®¹å™¨æ ·å¼ */
    body {
        width: 100vw;
        height: 100vh;
        position: relative;
    }

    .nuclear-warn {
        width: 200px;
        height: 200px;
        /* å‚ç›´æ°´å¹³å±…ä¸­ */
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        margin: auto;

        border-radius: 100px;
        overflow: hidden;
        font-size: 0;
    }

    .nuclear-warn::before,
    .nuclear-warn::after {
        content: "";
        display: block;
        height: 173px; /* è¾¹é•¿200pxçš„ç­‰è…°ä¸‰è§’å½¢é«˜åº¦*/
        box-sizing: border-box;
    }

    .nuclear-warn::before {
        margin-top: -73px;
        border-top: 173px solid yellow;
        border-left: 100px solid black;
        border-right: 100px solid black;
    }

    .nuclear-warn::after {
        border-left: 100px solid yellow;
        border-right: 100px solid yellow;
        border-bottom: 173px solid black;
    }
</style>

ç¥å¥‡çš„ conic-gradient åœ†é”¥æ¸å˜-å®ç°æ ¸è¾å°„å›¾

å½©è›‹ï¼šå®ç°ä¸‰è§’å½¢å†ä¹Ÿä¸é€šè¿‡borderçš„é€æ˜åº¦äº†ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ conic-gradient

æ•ˆæœå›¾åˆ†åˆ«å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼Œé€šè¿‡æ•ˆæœå›¾æˆ‘ä»¬èƒ½å¤Ÿçœ‹å‡ºå®ç°æ ¸è¾å°„å›¾éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨åˆ°åœ†é”¥æ¸å˜

æˆ‘ä»¬è¦å®ç°çš„æ•ˆæœå›¾éœ€è¦é¢œè‰²ä¹‹é—´çš„å®Œå…¨éš”ç¦»ï¼Œå› æ­¤å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å¦‚ä¸‹ä»£ç å®ç°

Using conic-gradient

<div class="radiation-warning"></div>
.radiation-warning {
  width: 100px;
  height: 100px;
  background: conic-gradient(
    yellow 0deg 60deg,
    black 60deg 120deg,
    yellow 120deg 180deg,
    black 180deg 240deg,
    yellow 240deg 300deg,
    black 300deg 360deg
  );
}

Result:

Add a radius and rotate

border-radius: 50%;
transform: rotate(-30deg);

Result:

Repeating-conic-gradient

.radiation-warning {
  width: 100px;
  height: 100px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  transform: rotate(-30deg);
  background: repeating-conic-gradient(
    from 0deg,
    yellow 0deg 60deg,
    black 60deg 120deg
  );
}

Result:

Add the circle

.radiation-warning::after{
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  background: radial-gradient(
    rgb(36, 31, 33) 13px,
    rgb(242, 215, 74) 13px
  );
}

Result:

One more thing

add the border

.radiation-warning {
  border: 10px solid rgb(242, 215, 74);
}
.radiation-warning::before{
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  width: 120px;
  height: 120px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 5px solid rgb(36, 31, 33);
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
}

Result:

Online Demo

codepen

Reference

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/gradient/conic-gradient
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/gradient/repeating-conic-gradient

Using Canvas

let size = 100
let borderWidth = 6
let pad = size * 0.12
let insideRoundR = size * 0.12
let insideRoundPad = insideRoundR * 0.19
let r = size / 2
let insideR = r - pad
let canvas = document.createElement("canvas")
document.body.append(canvas)
canvas.width = size
canvas.height = size
let ctx = canvas.getContext("2d")
// draw border
ctx.beginPath()
ctx.lineWidth = 6
ctx.arc(r, r, r - borderWidth / 2, 0, Math.PI * 2)
ctx.strokeStyle = "black"
ctx.stroke()
// fill yellow
ctx.beginPath()
ctx.arc(r, r, r - borderWidth, 0, Math.PI * 2)
ctx.fillStyle = "yellow"
ctx.fill()
// draw tri
let Hx = r + insideR * Math.cos(Math.PI / 3)
let Hy = r + insideR * Math.sin(Math.PI / 3)
let Ix = r
let Iy = r + insideR / Math.cos(Math.PI / 6)
let Gx = r - insideR * Math.cos(Math.PI / 3)
let Gy = r + insideR * Math.sin(Math.PI / 3)
ctx.beginPath()
ctx.moveTo(r, r)
ctx.lineTo(Hx, Hy)
ctx.arcTo(Ix, Iy, Gx, Gy, insideR)
ctx.fillStyle = "black"
ctx.fill()

Hx = r + insideR * Math.cos(Math.PI / 3)
Hy = r - insideR * Math.sin(Math.PI / 3)
Ix = r + insideR
Iy = r - Math.tan(Math.PI / 6) * insideR
Gx = r + insideR
Gy = r
ctx.beginPath()
ctx.moveTo(r, r)
ctx.lineTo(Hx, Hy)
ctx.arcTo(Ix, Iy, Gx, Gy, insideR)
ctx.fill()

Hx = r - insideR
Hy = r
Ix = r - insideR
Iy = r - Math.tan(Math.PI / 6) * insideR
Gx = r - insideR * Math.cos(Math.PI / 3)
Gy = r - insideR * Math.sin(Math.PI / 3)
ctx.beginPath()
ctx.moveTo(r, r)
ctx.lineTo(Hx, Hy)
ctx.arcTo(Ix, Iy, Gx, Gy, insideR)
ctx.fill()

ctx.beginPath()
ctx.arc(r, r, insideRoundR, 0, Math.PI * 2)
ctx.fillStyle = "yellow"
ctx.fill()

ctx.beginPath()
ctx.arc(r, r, insideRoundR - insideRoundPad, 0, Math.PI * 2)
ctx.fillStyle = "black"
ctx.fill()
